docs.text: Welcome to the FreeMoCap Its 24 July 2022, and I'm just playing around with mkdocs right now. Seems pretty cool! We're planning to build a Knowledge Base that roughly follows the structure outlined here ...but until then, I'm just going to point you back to the ( README.md ) in the main repository: https://github.com/freemocap/freemocap We've also got a pretty nice website: https://freemocap.org Work in progress, stay tuned!! ✨💀✨
